Author: GitHub
Title: GitHub for Beginners is back!
Description:
We're back with Season 3 of GitHub for Beginners, here to answer all your questions from how to start with GitHub issues to what are Actions. This season covers building your portfolio with GitHub Pages, setting up Actions, collabing in VS code, and so much more. If you're just getting started with GitHub, this new season is for you.

#GitHub #GitHubIssues #Coding

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

YouTube: https://gh.io/subgithub Blog: https://github.blog X: https://twitter.com/github LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/github Insider newsletter: https://resources.github.com/newsletter/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/github TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@github

About GitHub It’s where over 180 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
